title: On the Feynman Graph Integrals on Elliptic Curves
abstract:
We introduce the regularized integrals for decorated graphs on elliptic
curves, which produces an almost holomorphic function on upper half plane. Then
we give the graph version of holomorphic anomaly equation to study the
anti-holomorphic dependence of the graph integral. Finally, we give a general
method to compute the graph integral.
